data.what_is: iwinBACK helps marketers "win back" the power to understand and communicate with their customers through automation, channel unification, data analytics, easy asset creation, and a custom journey creator. We bring a new level of efficiency and performance to digital marketing teams by helping them build and manage campaigns and call centre staff, for multiple markets, brands, and segments simultaneously. Real time data analysis with actionable insights help to continually improve KPIs.
data.product_description:
iwinBACK is a direct marketing automation system that creates channel unification and allows you to schedule, in advance, multi channel marketing campaigns.

Customer journey software is often overly complicated, at IWB we keep it simple. We understand that your goal is to create and adapt customer journeys which lead to increased engagement rates and improved customer loyalty.

We specialize in building effective customer journeys and we ensure our customers consistently see great results across KPIs when using our platform.

Our focus is on data compliance, automation, great customer support, and leveraging behavioural analytics to improve the customer experience, and of course, revenues.

initial_reviews.review_title: The best customer journey tool on the market
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about iwinBACK?
iwinBACK is a marketing gem, transforming customer engagement with its innovative platform. Its a marketer's true friend , offering a suite of tools for seamless automation, insightful for analytics, and multi-channel communication. Our CRM team users rave about its ease of use and the efficiency in campaign and template management. The all-in-one platform unifies communications across channels , significantly boosting our conversions and the ROI on direct marketing, its the best we have seen.
iwinBACK is a must have for B2C marketers aiming to optimise customer retention and engagement. Higly recomend this game changing product.

What do you dislike about iwinBACK?
It is a cutting edge tool and some junior members struggle a little bit with the advanced marketing journeys , though this isn't really a problem.

What problems is iwinBACK solving and how is that benefiting you?
It allows us to integrate multiple channels using a simplified journey tool.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about iwinBACK?
IWb features like journey which help a lot. Also, dynamic content, email template, A/B testing which is very critical when comes to segmentation.

What do you dislike about iwinBACK?
We need go through  APi to have automated like welcome email for new registration.

What problems is iwinBACK solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's help on turn around time when creating journey.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about iwinBACK?
multi-channel messaging through one platform to attract new business leads.

What do you dislike about iwinBACK?
Response time by support team and less content in knoweldgebase.

What problems is iwinBACK solving and how is that benefiting you?
Using the iwinBACK software made it easier for us to take control of all our outbound marketing efforts, after events and to keep in touch with contacts through the various communication channels.
